summary: A simple text file that increases skills, regeneration rates, and much more.
descriptionHtml:
Just place the cheat.txt file in the same folder as the launcher.
In game open the cheat menu by hitting the `(Tilde) key and type bat cheat and hit enter. 
Basically I don\'t like to use god mode but I do like to cheat a ton. These are just the cheats I use when i first start a new game. Enjoy! :)

The file contains the commands to do all of the following:
Set all skills to 9999
Set regeneration rate for health, magicka, and stamina to 1000
Melee and unarmed damage to 1000
Set critical chance to 100
Left and right hand weapon speed to 5
Zooming in with bows freezes time
Shout recovery time to 0
Silent when moving
Health and magicka regeneration rates during combat doesn\'t change
Gives 2000 dragon souls
Maxes out carry weight
Gives 50000 each of health, magicka, and stamina
Undetectable while sneaking
Pickpocket chance set to 100%
Toggle all map markers
Add two billion each of gold and lock picks
Add all perks
Add all shouts except Call Dragon
And finally it is supposed to increase level to 100
author: CyCkOfReAk
